name: Dress Up Donna Doll
description:
If you are looking for dress-up games, doll games, fashion games, hair games, you are highly recommended to try Donna Doll game.

DONNA DOLL FEATURES
- Collect clothes, items, speech bubbles and decorations.
- Create your own doll with various hairstyles and different dresses.
- Random doll generator feature with variety of styles.
- Tons of fancy accessories to put on.
- More than 1000 different kinds of code items.
- A variety of new products added every week.
- Make beautiful avatars and wallpaper.

HOW TO PLAY
- Use the touch screen to choose a doll to give a makeover to.
- Dress up doll by choosing beautiful hairstyle, dresses, shoes and outfits.
- Pick out background and decorate with stickers.
- Save your image to make the wallpaper or share it with your friends.

Change the doll's clothes, hair and color scheme, from hair to eyes, everything can be customized to make your personal dolls style truly shine. It's really interesting.

Please enjoy Doll Dress Up game in many ways!
